content: squish from string theory yarn shop materials 1 skein berroco wizard - color 2954 us 11 8mm 24 circular needles gauge 13 stitches and 25 row = 4 10cm gauge is not critical for this pattern finished size approx 10 26cm tall instructions 32 80cm around abbreviations co 120 sts join for knitting in the round taking care to not twist sts bobble - bind off round 1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to end of round co - cast on round 2 p1 *k1 p3 repeat from * around to last 3 sts k1 p2 k - knit p - purl repeat these two rounds until you ve used up almost all of your repeat - repeat yarn it doesn t matter which round you end on you ll want to sts - stitches save about five yards of yarn for the bobble bobble loosely in pattern weave in ends and block squish is exactly what the name implies squishy this cowl is a enjoy quick knit with just enough pattern to be interesting but not boring the finished cowl is reversible thanks to the mistake rib pattern it s great for all knitters this cowl can be made at any from beginner to experienced gauge with any yarn simply cast and the soft squishiness will on multiples of 4 sts to equal keep you warm all winter approx 32 circumference squish c string theory yarn shop 2022
